I think at a minimum changing to dyn Error + Send + Sync would be a step forward for 0.3. It does mean that a users error type needs to be thread safe even if there code does not use it. But compatibility with anyhow would be a big improvement.

Ideally we would make it a generic, as the only thing we do with it is get it from a DependencyProvider and hand it back to the user. I have tried it a few times, and it works. But it would require adding more complexity to DependencyProvider so I did not want to make a PR until after VersionSet and Priority.

I see. By the way I'haven't being active lately. I've had limited time and other projects to tend to. Sorry for not getting back to those two PRs yet.
